Best Android Apps for Samsung Galaxy S 3 or Galaxy Tab 2

When you purchase a Samsung Galaxy S3 or a Galaxy Tab 2, you may naturally think of getting some apps for them. Now let’s take a look at some of the best android apps for your Galaxy S III or Galaxy Tab 2, and most of them are free.

Best Android Apps for Samsung Galaxy S 3 or Galaxy Tab 2: Antivirus

Norton Antivirus (Free)
Norton™ Mobile Security Lite is the best app among the other security related Samsung Galaxy S3 apps because it will protects your mobile device against loss, theft and malware. You have many private data saved in your handset so it is necessary to save it from hackers and spammers and this app is the best for it. This app is FREE.

Best Android Apps for Samsung Galaxy S 3 or Galaxy Tab 2: Multimedia

Spotify (Free app, paid service)
Spotify is a streaming music app where you can listen to literally millions of tracks from a vast array of musicians. With the Spotify app, you can choose to listen for free, or subscribe to Spotify Premium.

MX Player (Free ad-supported, or Pro $5.6)
MX Player is the Android video player that performs multi-core decoding. According to test results on dual-core devices, it showed up to 70% performance improvement over single-core decoding. You can get it for free, if you’re satisfied with MX Player then support the developer and you can get a paid version here.

Best Android Apps for Samsung Galaxy S 3 or Galaxy Tab 2: E-Book Reader

Kindle Reader (Free)
The Kindle app puts over a million books at your fingertips. It’s the app for every reader, whether you’re a book reader, magazine reader, or newspaper reader—and you don’t need to own a Kindle to use it. Choose from over a million Kindle books from the Kindle Store or enjoy popular magazines like The Economist and Reader’s Digest with high-resolution color images.

Best Android Apps for Samsung Galaxy S 3 or Galaxy Tab 2: Browsers

Google Chrome (Free)
Search and browse fast with Chrome on your Android phone and tablet. Sign in to sync your personalized Chrome experience from your computer to bring it with you anywhere you go.

Best Android Apps for Samsung Galaxy S 3 or Galaxy Tab 2: Games

Angry Birds Space (Free)
Angry Birds Space features 60 interstellar levels on planets and in zero gravity, resulting in spectacular gameplay ranging from slow-motion puzzles to lightspeed destruction. With regular free updates, brand new birds, brand new superpowers, and a whole galaxy to explore, the sky is no longer the limit!

Grand Theft Auto 3 ($4.99)
GTA3 is the open world sandbox game that started it all. You can run, shoot, steal and run hookers over with the car you stole. This game is violent and it doesn’t apologise for it. It’s hard to believe that we now have handheld devices capable of playing games like this, but we do and it’s great.

Great Little War Game ($o.99)
Great Little War Game (GLWG) is a turn based strategy game that is comparable to Advance Wars or Fire Emblem on GBA. The key difference being that it has far prettier graphics and is fully touch optimised. GLWG is a game with highly stylised graphics and even a bit of silly humour coming through. This game has character.

http://www.enolsoft.com/blog/best-android-apps-for-samsung-galaxy-s-3-or-galaxy-tab-2

Download Funny Baby Videos for Free

Babies – they’re hilarious, It is almost impossible not to be affected by the purity of their joy. so it’s no surprise that some of the most popular videos on YouTube are baby videos. That’s what brings us to the second part of our YouTube funny video series.

Previously, we have introduced how to free download funny videos on YouTube. Today, we’re looking at funny baby videos and asking the question, “How to free download these funny baby videos from YouTube and play those videos on portables?”

Well, with iFunia YouTube Converter for Mac – an all in one YouTube Downloader and Converter for you to easily download and convert funny baby videos on YouTube with just a few clicks. You don’t need to know about video formats or settings – just run the program, paste YouTube URLs, and hit Convert.

3 Funniest Baby Videos on YouTube
Talking Twin Babies

“Bah” officially just became new age. These boys will solve the worlds problems in 2 mins flat.

Emerson – Mommy’s Nose is Scary!
The point in life when you realize Mom is crazy, yet funny at the same time…

Baby Dancing to Beyonce- Single Ladies

This baby really gets into dancing to Beyonce. With moves like this, it’s hard to believe this clip is real! Who taught this baby to dance?

If you like these videos and want to create a library of funny baby videos on your own computer or portables like iPad, iPhone, iPod, Google Nexus 7, Kindle Fire, Samsung Galaxy S3, here are the easy steps to help you downloading YouTube funny baby videos to MP4 on Mac with iFunia YouTube Converter for Mac.

Download Free Trial of iFunia YouTube Converter for Mac

Step 1. Add YouTube funny baby videos
Run YouTube Converter for Mac and click “YouTube Add URL” button to add YouTube funny baby video URLs. Or you can directly drag and drop funny baby video URLs to YouTube Converter’s main interface for downloading.

Step 2. Start downloading funny baby videos
The funny baby videos will be downloaded automatically when you click the “OK” button. When the downloading is completed, go to “Convert” part, and we are ready to convert the downloaded YouTube funny baby videos to portables on Mac.

Tips: You can also import local FLV video for converting by click the “Add Files” icon to add local FLV videos from Mac.

Step 3. Start converting YouTube funny baby videos to portables
Click the gear-like icon at the end of the content to reach the output setting window. Click the “Convert to” column to open the format drop-down list. The last step is to click “Convert” to start converting funny baby videos to portables on Mac.

Top 5 Halloween Movies for Kids on YouTube

With Halloween around the corner, here we list 5 of the best-known family friendly Halloween movies to help get you and your kids into the spooky season’s spirit.

Best Kids-Friendly Halloween Movies on YouTube – Hocus Pocus

Genres: Comedy, Family
Released: 1993
Price: $1.99 for Movie Rental from YouTube Movie Channel
Free Resources from YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7QBYYEhtzVY

This is by far the best family Halloween movie. You have witches running amuck on Halloween night with trick-or-treating, zombies, and black cats all in the mix. At the same time it’s a great family movie.

Best Kids-Friendly Halloween Movies on YouTube – The Nightmare Before Christmas

Genres: Animation, Family
Released: 1993
Price: $1.99 for Movie Rental from YouTube Movie Channel
Free Resources from YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hvPc_CQmfqY

Nightmare is good enough to deserve to become a holiday tradition, both for Halloween and Xmas. Head to the theater, pick it up on DVD or watch it on YouTube. If you have kids, there are worse things they could find under a tree than Jack Skellington.

Best Kids-Friendly Halloween Movies on YouTube – Bedknobs and Broomsticks

Genres: Comedy, Family
Released: 1971
Price: $9.99 for Movie Purchase from YouTube Movie Channel

Bedknobs and Broomsticks is a classic Disney movie. Lansbury and Tomlinson are perfect, the songs are wonderful, the dances, with a particular mention for the “Portobello Ballet” are gorgeous. As for the animated section, the match between animals has become an instant classic; the climax with the attack of the armatures is chilling and fascinating.

Best Kids-Friendly Halloween Movies on YouTube – Return To Halloweentown

Genres: Family
Released: 2006
Price: $9.99 for Movie Purchase from YouTube Movie Channel

A must have for your Halloween collection! True spirit of childhood! There truly is no other movie or series like the Halloweentown line. An actual original idea, which is difficult to find nowadays.

Best Kids-Friendly Halloween Movies on YouTube – Spookley: The Square Pumpkin

Genres: Family
Released: 2004
Price: $2.99 for Movie Rental from YouTube Movie Channel

Spookley the Square Pumpkin, based on a story by Joe Toriano, concerns a pumpkin named Spookley who suffers serious abuse at the hands of other pumpkins because of his unusual shape. Although he finds a few friends to help him out, all of the pumpkins learn how good a pumpkin Spookley is after bad weather makes all the round pumpkins unable to keep themselves upright.

Best ways to download Kids-friendly YouTube Halloween films using a Mac:

3. Download Kids-friendly YouTube Halloween movies to MP3 audio formats with YouTube to MP3 Converter.
